charges.charge_description: On or about July 21, 2005 in Brewster county, in the Western District of Texas defendants did knowingly, unlawfully and intentionally possess with intent to distribute appoximately 3, 144.9 lbs of marijuana, a schedule I controlled substance in violation of Title 21 USC 841(a)(1).
